title: Hollywood screenwriters don’t want robots taking their jobs, either
description: The thousands of WGA scribes who went on strike this week are concerned in part about the rise of AI — and how the major studios might tap that technology going forward.

title: DA will not charge ex-Memphis police officer involved in Tyre Nichols stop
description: No criminal charges will be brought against a Memphis police officer who was fired for his involvement in the traffic stop that led to the death of Tyre Nichols, the Shelby County district attorney said Tuesday.

title: Friend testifies E. Jean Carroll called her 'minutes' after alleged Trump attack
description: E. Jean Carroll's friend testified in federal court that the writer called her "minutes" after Donald Trump allegedly raped her in a Manhattan department store.

title: Autopsy shows tech exec Bob Lee consumed alcohol, cocaine and ketamine before he was killed
description: Bob Lee, the Cash App founder stabbed to death in San Francisco, ingested alcohol, cocaine and ketamine before he was killed, an autopsy report revealed.

title: Senate Republicans dismiss the possibility of a short-term debt limit increase
description: A number of Senate Republicans on Tuesday rejected the idea of lifting the debt ceiling temporarily, in order to buy Congress time to negotiate a larger measure.

title: Biden to send active-duty troops to the southern border as Covid restrictions end
description: The Biden administration is considering sending active-duty troops to the southern border as it lifts Covid restrictions next week.

title: Dark web drug marketplace busted by Europol
description: Law enforcement agencies around the world seized an online marketplace and arrested nearly 300 people allegedly involved in buying and selling drugs, European Union law enforcement agency Europol said Tuesday.

title: Jamaal Bowman is quickly becoming progressives' new megaphone in Congress
description: New York Rep. Jamaal Bowman’s booming voice is becoming ubiquitous on Capitol Hill as he pushes back on Trumpism and fights for gun control.

title: Samsung bans use of A.I. like ChatGPT for employees after misuse of the chatbot
description: Samsung is restricting the use of so-called generative artificial intelligence tools such as ChatGPT for employees after the company discovered such services were being misused.

title: ‘Godfather of AI’ shares ominous reason for leaving job at Google
description: Geoffrey Hinton, known as the “godfather of artificial intelligence,” has left his job at Google saying he wants to be free to talk about the possible dangers of the technology he helped develop.

title: A fight over religion and politics is roiling a Texas school board election. And 'it's gotten ugly.'
description: In the Grapevine, Texas, some voters say a nonpartisan school board election has divided locals and become a referendum over religion in schools
